text_block_list.text: It's been a short while since I became a new trainer at Tracen Academy. So far, I haven't been able to try to scout an Uma Musume, let alone become their trainer.
Naturally, I think they're all wonderful, but, when it comes to talking to them, for some reason I end up hesitating……

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: ――In that case, I have a suggestion…… if you're having trouble at Central, how about searching 『Outside』?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Yes♪ I'm sure you're already aware but, Uma Musume aren't limited to racing only in the Twinkle Series！

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Scattered all throughout Japan, different series exist, and in each district there are girls attending schools to hone their skills.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Occasionally, among those girls, someone with exceptional talent is found, and they'll come to Tracen academy as a transfer student by contracting with a trainer！
And with that, I made my way to the Oi Selection Race, where girls aiming to participate in Oi races gathered, but――
Probably because I'm unfamiliar with this place, I'm now completely lost, and on top of that――

text_block_list.name: Intimidating Cat
text_block_list.text: BuuNyaaaaaaao！！
All of a sudden a cat with an imposing physique started chasing me！ Eventually……
(Guuuuuuuu……)
Ahaahaahaahaa！！ Hey, hey, hey, what's wrong？ You look like ya could use somethin' to eat！

text_block_list.name: Intimidating Cat
text_block_list.text: Bunyaaaa～～～！！

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Well look what we have here. If it ain't this place's boss cat. ……Hahaa, did ya step in to this guy's territory？

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Now, now, he's just someone that's not from around here. Let's see, I can probably fix things by doin' this！ ……here kitty, kitty, good kitty！
With all the petting from this debonair Uma Musume, that ferocious cat instantly settled down！ I couldn't call her technique anything but superb……！

text_block_list.name: Intimidating Cat
text_block_list.text: FunyaAaan♪

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Oh, see ya later～！ ……well then. This your first time here？ On top of bein' chased around by the boss cat, you've been wanderin' around lost to the point you're starvin', huh？

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: In that case, how about comin' with me！？ I can show ya to a good Soba place.

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Of course！ I can't do somethin' as boorish as to just leave ya here. It's fine, so just shut up and follow me！
And so, I was led to the shopping district, this debonair Uma Musume seemed familiar with this place and confidently led me to a Soba stand.

text_block_list.name: Soba-stand Old Lady
text_block_list.text: Well, well, well, if it ain't Inari-chan！ Feelin' like some fried tofu？ I've got lots ready for ya！

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Oh, thanks for that！ But, old lady, can I get an order of soba too？ I brought ya a customer！

text_block_list.name: Soba-store Old Lady
text_block_list.text: Oh my, welcome！ Ufuufuu, if Inari-chan is bringin' ya here, I'll have to provide some service！
And with that, by 『Service』 she meant that my soba had TWO pieces of shrimp tempura. Because of that, it was very filling！

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Just melts in your mouth doesn't it！？ This is the best soba place around. ……and so？ You, where were ya headed to？

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Since we've come this far, I might as well accompany ya to the end！ This area is pretty much like my backyard, I can guide ya just about anywhere. Alright, let's hear it！

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Hmmm？ Did I hear that right？ ……Ahaa haa haa haa！！

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Well, what do ya know？ I was headin' there too！
And with that, somehow or other I made it to the Oi Racetrack, and I was able to spectate the Selection Race, but――
(UooOOOOOOOOH！)

text_block_list.name: Debonair Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: DaaAAAAARaAAAAA！！ Move it, outta the way, comin' through！！
I had no idea she was a participant！ No, more than that……！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: We're finally entering the last straight！ And kicking up a cloud of dust, pushing forward is Inari One, it's Inari One！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: With this…… it's over！ OraAAAAAAAA！！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Inari One takes the lead！！ Inari One is out in front！ 2 lengths, 3 lengths and more！！ There she goes, it's Inari One！！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Goal！ Inari One, wins the Oi Selection Race with an overwhelming 4 lengths！ Even with that small stature she's overflowing with such power, what a marvelous run！！
Without realizing it, I took a deep breath, I was so enthralled that I had forgotten to breathe. ……That's just how fascinating her run had been.
My pulse was racing. With each step, the earth seemed to shake beneath her feet. With fighting spirit that burned like fire. With brilliant speed even on the dirt.
Certainly, even on a turf course―― even in the Twinkle Series. It has to be her…… it has to be her！
choice_data_list: That girl―― I want to scout her！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Nah, sorry. I'm glad ya feel that way, but I can't accept that offer.
But, this debonair Uma Musume―― Inari One, who listened silently until I finished, plainly rejected me.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: As ya can tell, I'm a workin'-class girl raised in a workin'-class town！ Since the time I could walk, I was raised with all the other kids in town like one big family.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Even our runnin' styles are the same. There's someone who's been lookin' after and raisin' me this whole time. That person, is waitin' for me here on the Oi team.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: On top of that――

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: ――Ah, you're here, Inari-neesan！ Congratulationsー！ I…… ran out of stamina again, and got 5th though……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: What's with the gloomy face！？ Ya ran with all ya had, and came this far right？ Besides, the Chief's already talked to ya, hasn't he？

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Yeah！ Ever since I was small, I've looked up to Inari-neesan, and now we're on the same team……！ I'm glad！ I look forward to working with you！！

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ah, sorry for interrupting you！ I'll be heading off now！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Yeah, see ya later！！ …………and. Well, something like that.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: See, I'm an Edo kid after all. For the Chief that's been lookin' after me, and my cute follower, I can't just leave 'em be. ……Sorry 'bout that！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……Aw, c'mon, don't give me that sad look! You, you've got a good eye if ya came straight to me!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: With an eye like that, ya shouldn't have a problem findin' a good girl at Tracen Academy. It's a really prestigious school right？ In that case――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: But…… what？
choice_data_list: I still think it has to be you
I still think it has to be you

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ah, well…… i-is that so? Ummmmーーー………………

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……have ya memorized the area already？ Don't get caught by that boss cat again. Well then…… um, careful on your way back！
